SUMMARY OF SASB CONTENTS 
73 Indica tor Information / Page  Omiss ion 
FN-EX-510a.2 Discussion of processes for identifying and assessing 
conflicts of interest  Ethics and Corporate Policies, p. 20-23  
FN-EX-550a.3 Description of efforts to prevent technology errors, security 
breaches, and market disruptions  Clients, p. 32-40 
SASB Indicator Booklet, p.  59   
FN-EX-410a.4 Description of policy to encourage or enquire listed 
companies to publicly disclose environmental, social, and governance 
(ESG) information  ESG Governance, p.  24-27  
FN-AC-270a.3 Description of approach to informing customers about 
products and services  Clients, p. 32-40  
FN-AC-510a.1 Total amount of monetary losses as a result of legal  
proceedings associated with fraud, insider trading, anti -trust, anti -
competitive behavior, market manipulation, malpractice, of other related 
financial industry laws or regulations  SASB Indicator Booklet, p . 59  
FN-AC-510a.2 Description of whistle blower  policies and procedures  Ethics and Corporate Policies, p. 20-23  
FN-IB-330a.1 Percentage of gender and racial/ethnic group representation 
for (1) executive management, (2) non -executive management, (3) 
professionals, and (4) all other employees  Reported in GRI indicator 405 -1, see GRI Indicator Booklet, p. 71  
FN-IB-410a.2 (1) Number and (2) total value of investments and loans 
incorporating integration of environmental, social, and governance (ESG) 
factors, by industry  SASB Indicator Booklet, p. 60  
FN-IB-410a.3 Description of approach to incorporation of environmental, 
social, and governance (ESG) factors in investment banking and brokerage 
activities  Clients, p. 32-40  
FN-IB-510b.1 (1) Number and (2) percentage of covered employees with a 
record of investment -related investigations, consumer -initiated 
complaints, private civil litigations, or other Regulatory proceedings   Zero   
FN-IB-510b.2 Number of mediation and arbitration cases associated with 
professional integrity, including duty of care, by party  Zero.  
  
FN-IB-510b.3 Total amount of monetary losses as a result of legal 
proceedings associated with professional integrity, including duty of care  Zero.   
FN-CB-410a.2 (1) Number and (2) Total value of investments and loans 
incorporating  integration of environmental, social, and governance (ESG) 
factors, by industry  Risk Management, p.  28-31  
FN-CF-220a.1 Number of account holders whose information is used for 
secondary purposes  SASB Indicator Booklet, p.  61  
FN-CF-220a.2 Total amount of monetary losses as a result of legal 
proceedings associated with customer privacy  SASB Indicator Booklet, p.  61
